original_text: The stew was poured out for the men, but as they began to eat it, they cried out, “Man of God, there is death in the pot!” And they could not eat it.
korean_text: 이에 퍼다가 무리에게 주어 먹게 하였더니 무리가 국을 먹다가 그들이 외쳐 이르되 하나님의 사람이여 솥에 죽음의 독이 있나이다 하고 능히 먹지 못하는지라

sentences.original_text: The stew was poured out for the men
but as they began to eat it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들이 그것을 먹기 시작했을 때

sentences.original_text: there is death in the pot
And they could not eat it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것을 먹을 수 없었습니다
